commands.name: generate
commands.help:
A math expression to a 1024x1024 image convertor. You can use basic math, trigonometry functions and bitwise logic. You also have some variables.

__Variables__:
- current X coordinate (left -> right) (x)
- current Y coordinate (bottom -> top) (y)
- XYth iteration (bottom left -> top right) (counter)
- height and width (side)

__Caveats__:
- for bitwise logic, you have to use appropriate function

args.name: r
args.description: Math expression used for calculating red

args.name: g
args.description: Math expression used for calculating green

args.name: b
args.description: Math expression used for calculating blue

commands.name: color
commands.description: Generate a random unique (or not unique) color! Uses crypto random
commands.help: Generates a random unique (or not unique) color. Might be duplicate in which case it shows you the probability of this happening.

commands.name: load
commands.help: Select from the list of unloaded modules to load them.

args.name: modulename
args.description: The module you want to load

commands.name: unload
commands.help: Select from the list of loaded modules to unload them.

args.name: modulename
args.description: The module you want to unload

commands.name: reload
commands.help: Select from the list of loaded modules to reload them.

args.name: modulename
args.description: The module you want to reload

commands.name: requestkey
commands.help: A request to obtain an API key to the TZBot service. You will be asked a couple of questions. The answers will be used by the bot owner to determine if the request is accepted or not.

commands.name: set
commands.description: Sets your timezone to the correct one.
commands.help: Set your timezone with Timezone Bot to gain quality of life features!

args.name: tzalias
args.description: Alias with which other people will get your time.

commands.name: show
commands.help: Shows you timezone you set. Only you will be able to see this message.

commands.name: alias
commands.description: Alias when people want to know your time.
commands.help: If you didn't set your alias when adding your timezone or if you want to change it now, you can with this command.

args.name: tzalias
args.description: Alias with which other people will get your time.

commands.name: now
commands.help: Shows a time of the selected guild member if they set their timezone.

commands.name: tznow
commands.description: Shows the time in a certain timezone.
commands.help: You can check the current time at any timezone!

commands.name: link
commands.description: Links you to your Minecraft account.
commands.help: Links you to your Minecraft account. This will mainly have benefits in the future like gaining XP from typing into the Minecraft chat.

args.name: code
args.description: Code that was generated for you in Minecraft.

commands.name: unlink
commands.help: Unlinks your Minecraft account. Maybe if you want to lose all the benefits.

cmdGroups.name: help
cmdGroups.description: Shows different kinds of command help.

commands.name: commands
commands.description: Shows you available commands/help with a specific command.
commands.help: Shows you available commands/help with a specific command.

args.name: commandname
args.description: Command name to display help for. If left empty, shows a list of commands.

commands.name: groups
commands.description: Shows you help for a specific command group.
commands.help: Shows you help for a specific command group.

args.name: groupname
args.description: Command Group name to display help for.
